subcategory_lists.title: Educational Content/ Publishing
subcategory_lists.description: Includes companies involved in developing, providing and publishing educational content, including but not limited to companies providing digital content for test preparations, language learning courses, and traditional and interactive etextbooks for purchase or rental.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 교육 콘텐츠 개발 및 제공, 디지털 콘텐츠 제공, 교과서 대여 및 구매 등 교육 관련 기업 포함

subcategory_lists.title: Digital Learning Platforms
subcategory_lists.description: Includes companies which are involved in providing digital learning platforms, MOOCs (Massive Open Online Courses), accredited online courses, recognized educational degrees, vocational training, educational games and training/tutor services, content delivery tools (e.g. digital whiteboards), augmented/virtual reality based education/training, and artificial intelligence tools for augmenting teaching and learning.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 온라인 교육 및 학습 플랫폼, 인증 온라인 강의, 교육 학위, 직업 훈련, 교육 게임, 디지털 화이트보드 등을 제공하는 기업들을 포함합니다.

subcategory_lists.title: Early Childhood Education
subcategory_lists.description: Includes companies involved in providing early/pre-school education services, managing child-care centers and related services.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 유치원 및 어린이집 관리 및 서비스 제공 회사 포함.

subcategory_lists.title: Secondary, Higher and Professional Education
subcategory_lists.description: Includes companies that provide campus-based courses, classroom-based tutoring services, and companies providing secondary, higher and professional education services, and programs excluding for-profit schools/universities.
subcategory_lists.title_kr: 교육 서비스 업체, 학교 및 직업 교육에 관련된 주식
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 학원, 과외 서비스, 고등 교육 및 전문 교육 서비스를 제공하는 기업을 포함하고 있습니다.
